hero.title: Cultivating Excellence, Delivering Nature's Finest
hero.subtitle: At PT Pagilaran, we are dedicated to cultivating the finest tea leaves, ensuring every cup embodies the rich heritage and unparalleled quality of Indonesian tea.

offices.name: Head Office
offices.label: Main Office
offices.address: Jl. Pagilaran No. 1, Batang, Central Java 51271, Indonesia

translation.hero_subtitle: At PT Pagilaran, we are dedicated to cultivating the finest tea leaves, ensuring every cup embodies the rich heritage and unparalleled quality of Indonesian tea.
translation.quick_overview_description: PT Pagilaran is a leading tea producer committed to sustainable practices and delivering premium tea products globally. Our rich history and dedication to quality make us a trusted name in the tea industry.
translation.quick_overview_profile_description: PT Pagilaran is a private company engaged integrally in plantations, industry, trade, and consulting, with tea and cocoa as its main commodities. For over 50 years, PT Pagilaran has managed two core units and four plasma units, driven by a business spirit that is not only profit-oriented but also focused on sustainability and social contribution. As part of Gadjah Mada University (UGM), PT Pagilaran carries out the mandate of Tri Dharma Perguruan Tinggi (education, research, and community service) through scientific research collaboration by students, lecturers, and researchers, as well as farmer empowerment programs under the National Smallholder Core Plantation (PIR) scheme.
translation.heritage_hero_description: From Dutch colonial origins to modern academic excellence, our journey spans over a century of dedication to premium tea cultivation, innovation, and sustainable practices that honor both tradition and progress.
translation.heritage_timeline_description: Discover the key milestones that shaped PT Pagilaran into the premium tea exporter we are today

1910.title: Founding of Pagilaran
1910.description: PT Pagilaran was established as a tea plantation by the Dutch colonial government, laying the foundation for a century of tea cultivation.
1910.details: The initial focus was on cultivating high-quality tea leaves for export to European markets.

1968.title: Integration with UGM
1968.description: PT Pagilaran became part of Gadjah Mada University (UGM), marking a new era of academic and research collaboration.
1968.details: This integration fostered a unique blend of commercial operations with educational and research mandates.

1980.title: Expansion of Cocoa Cultivation
1980.description: Diversification into cocoa cultivation began, expanding the company's agricultural portfolio.
1980.details: This strategic move aimed to broaden product offerings and enhance agricultural sustainability.

2000.title: Modernization and Sustainability Initiatives
2000.description: Implementation of modern processing technologies and sustainable farming practices to enhance product quality and environmental responsibility.
2000.details: Investments were made in eco-friendly methods and community empowerment programs.

2020.title: Global Market Expansion
2020.description: Significant expansion into new international markets, solidifying PT Pagilaran's position as a global tea exporter.
2020.details: New partnerships and distribution channels were established across various continents.

translation.heritage_legacy_description: More than a century of tea cultivation has taught us that excellence is not just about the final product, but about every step of the journey. From the careful selection of tea varietals to the sustainable farming practices that protect our environment for future generations.
translation.heritage_legacy_point2: Industry: Modern tea and cocoa processing
translation.heritage_legacy_point3: Trade: Product distribution to domestic and international markets
translation.vision_description: To be a globally recognized leader in sustainable tea production and innovation, contributing significantly to the well-being of society and the environment.
translation.mission_1: Enhance company value through good corporate governance, operational efficiency, and human resource development.
translation.mission_2: Commit to research and development to continuously produce superior products and relevant agribusiness solutions.
translation.mission_3: Implement sustainable and environmentally friendly tea cultivation practices.
translation.mission_4: Improve the welfare of employees and surrounding communities through fair and equitable partnerships.
translation.organizational_values_description: The core principles that guide our actions, decisions, and relationships
translation.value_integrity_description: Upholding honesty, transparency, and ethical conduct in all business activities.
translation.value_sustainability_description: Committed to environmentally friendly practices and social responsibility.
translation.value_innovation_description: Continuously seeking new ways to improve products, processes, and services.
translation.value_quality_description: Delivering superior tea products that meet the highest standards of excellence.
translation.value_community_description: Fostering positive relationships and contributing to the well-being of local communities.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Pursuing the highest standards in every aspect, from tea cultivation to customer service.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Implementing research-based innovation and continuous improvement in all our operational aspects.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to environmental management and sustainable practices for future generations.

community.title: Community
community.description: Supporting and empowering communities in our operational areas through various development programs.

translation.featured_products_description: Explore our exquisite range of tea products, crafted with passion and precision.
translation.product_black_tea_description: Rich and robust, our black tea offers a classic taste experience.
translation.product_green_tea_description: Fresh and vibrant, our green tea is known for its delicate flavor and health benefits.
translation.product_oolong_tea_description: A unique blend of black and green tea, offering a complex and aromatic profile.
translation.global_impact_description: Our commitment extends beyond tea production to making a positive impact worldwide.
translation.impact_sustainability_description: Implementing eco-friendly farming methods and supporting biodiversity.
translation.impact_community_description: Investing in education, healthcare, and infrastructure for local communities.
translation.impact_fair_trade_description: Ensuring fair wages and ethical working conditions for our farmers.
translation.footer_address: Address: Jl. Raya Pagilaran No. 1, Batang, Central Java, Indonesia
